Text:
Video is great, but the audio is killing me.
Tried vlc and km player.....any1 else facing audio problems?
Yeah...both VLC and KLM can't play this one straight..I'm dumping this one and searching for a better copy...no offense to ExtraTorrentRG

this seems to an issue as far as audio is concerned
as some ppl say its fine and some ppl find it a nitemare

I have also experienced problems with audio for this torrent .... I thought I might have changed settings for audio rate in VLC at first but media player and others did the same. A shame really, the video quality is a 10/10! Looks like a good movie too, just didn't wanna spoil it with audio issues. :(

Thank you for/to the uploader for the effort
 tho.  :)  :)
